general.name: specFull_coadd
general.short: spectral data for a given custom coadd, mjd, and catalogid with exposures
general.description: The spectral data for a given custom coadd, mjd, and catalogid including the coadded spectra, spAll metadata, Model fit metadata from spZall, and Line fitting metadadta from spZline. It also includes an additional extension for each exposure included in the coadded spectra.
